About Geo‑Mapping Consults Ltd

Learn more about our company, mission, vision and values.

Our Story

Geo‑Mapping Consults Ltd is an indigenous geospatial service provider born out of passion for precision and excellence. Founded by seasoned surveyors and project managers, our company has grown from a humble start‑up into a trusted partner for clients across Nigeria and beyond. We offer a broad spectrum of geospatial solutions including land surveying, marine and bathymetric surveys, GIS data management, drone and satellite imagery, and project management services. Whether working on infrastructure developments, environmental assessments, property documentation or remote sensing projects, our goal is to supply accurate, timely and actionable data that empowers informed decisions.

Our Approach

At Geo‑Mapping Consults we believe that quality data is the bedrock of successful projects. Our approach combines meticulous planning, cutting‑edge technology and a highly trained team to deliver results that meet international standards. We invest in modern equipment such as GNSS receivers, total stations, drones and bathymetric sensors to collect precise spatial data. Our GIS analysts and engineers process and visualise this information using industry‑leading software, presenting insights in intuitive formats. From concept to completion, we collaborate closely with clients to understand their needs and tailor solutions that add value

Our years of experience and innovations have allowed us to expand into a new era by offering cut edge technological services and a consistent forward thinking approach in serving our clients. We strongly believe that success is achieved through commitment, integrity, discipline, innovation and professionalism.

Mission & Vision

Our Mission: To deliver high‑quality geospatial services that enhance decision‑making and foster sustainable development. We strive to exceed client expectations through innovation, integrity and a commitment to excellence.

Our Vision: To be the preferred geospatial partner in Africa, recognised for setting new standards in surveying, mapping, remote sensing and data analytics.

Our Values

  • Integrity: We uphold the highest ethical standards, ensuring that trust and transparency guide everything we do.
  • Professionalism: We rely on qualified experts and rigorous processes to guarantee accuracy and reliability.
  • Innovation: We embrace new technologies and continually improve our methods to stay at the forefront of the industry.
  • Collaboration: We work closely with clients, partners and communities to understand their needs and deliver solutions that make a difference.
